scripts.dev:web: cd apps/web && npx prisma generate && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm run clean && npm i &&  npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd apps/web && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../mobile && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.prismaUnix: cd apps/web/prisma && rm -rf  prisma/migrations && npx prisma migrate dev dev init && npx prisma generate
scripts.prismaWin: cd apps/web/prisma && rmdir /s /q   prisma/migrations && npx prisma migrate dev dev init && npx prisma generate
